title: Football Team Guesser
description: Can you identify these football teams from their logo silhouettes?

items.name: Manchester United
hints: This team plays at Old Trafford
Their nickname is the Red Devils
They're one of the most successful English football clubs

items.name: FC Barcelona
hints: This team plays at Camp Nou
Their motto is 'Més que un club' (More than a club)
They're based in Catalonia, Spain

items.name: Bayern Munich
hints: This team is from Germany
They play at the Allianz Arena
They're the most successful German football club

items.name: Real Madrid
hints: This team plays at Santiago Bernabéu Stadium
They wear white home kits
They're known for their Galácticos policy

items.name: Liverpool FC
hints: This team plays at Anfield
Their anthem is 'You'll Never Walk Alone'
They're based in Merseyside, England

items.name: Juventus
hints: This team is from Turin, Italy
They're known as 'The Old Lady'
Their home kits feature black and white stripes

items.name: Paris Saint-Germain
hints: This team is from France's capital
Their colors are blue, red, and white
They play at the Parc des Princes
